modMetaData.name: Disable Animated Marsh | Clean Textures - VTE, Regrowth Compatibility Patch
modMetaData.author: Kobe Riddle
modMetaData.description:
Disables the animated marsh from Vanilla Textures Expanded and Regrowth: Core so that the Clean Textures marsh texture works properly.
Created by Kobe Riddle. KobeRiddle.dev
